articles.description: Bhumika Gurung and Shekhar Malhotra pose for the lensman during their starry wedding reception held in Mumbai on March 08, 2022. Inside pictures from Bhumika Gurung and Shekhar Malhotra's starry wedding reception Photogallery at ETimes
articles.content:
Mahhi, Arti and Sana strike a pose for the lensman during Bhumika Gurung and Shekhar Malhotra's starry wedding reception held in Mumbai on March 08, 2022.

articles.title: Rupali Ganguly felt too 'plump' for Anupamaa, producer told her 'mothers don't have a flat stomach, time to hit the gym' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Anupamaa actor Rupali Ganguly has revealed she was apprehensive of playing the lead role on Anupamaa as she felt overweight and wanted to look slim on screen.
articles.content: Rupali Ganguly, who plays the lead role of a Gujarati homemaker on television show Anupamaa, has said she was apprehensive about taking up the role. On the show, the actor is seen as a devoted mother… [+1778 chars]

articles.title: Valimai box office collection Day 13: Ajith film enters profit zone in Tamil Nadu - India Today
articles.description: Ajith Kumar's Valimai entered the profit zone within two weeks of its release. Directed by H Vinoth, the action film is produced by Boney Kapoor.

articles.title: Bheemla Nayak box office collection Day 12: Pawan Kalyan film remains steady - India Today
articles.description: Pawan Kalyan and Rana Daggubati's Bheemla Nayak is likely to cross Rs 200 crore at the box office this weekend. The film was released in theatres on February 25.
